name: Universal Serial Bus (RPG Prototype)
description:
THIS IS A PROTOTYPE: there's basically just the engine and little to no content.

I'm seeking teammates, if you're a

  • Story writer
  • Pixel artist
  • I really need a story writer

And you're in for a fun project comment!

 -= Lore =-

This is an undertale style rpg where you're on a quest to find the Universal Serial Bus, which is totally a vehicle btw.

Go around and do stuff!

-= Technical details =-

I coded the engine, and it still lacks a combat system.
To play, simply run main.py with python3 (pygame required)
